Sentencas: Reduce electrolyte thickness can improve solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: However, thinner electrolyte often contains prominent defects and flaws, which may decrease the yield and increase operation risk.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: This work proposes a method to modify the thin film YSZ electrolyte, to improve cell reliability and durability.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: The as-sintered anode supported half-cell with screen printed YSZ electrolyte was immersed in precursor solution of Y(NO3)(3)center dot 6H(2)O and Zr(NO3)(4)center dot 5H(2)O, and being treated under hydrothermal condition of 150 degrees C for 12 h. As a result, the modified cells show slight increase in the OCV values.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: Furthermore, the hydrothermal modification effectively promotes interface sintering between YSZ electrolyte and GDC barrier layer, yielding a smaller ohmic resistance of .142 omega center dot cm(2) (a decrease of similar to 11%) and a higher peak power density of .964 W/cm(2) (an increase of similar to 18%) at 750 degrees C, than pristine cell.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: Moreover, the modified cell operates stably over 300 h, while the pristine cell presents large and irregular voltage fluctuations.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: This work suggests that the hydrothermal modification is an effective and promisingly industrial applicable method for thin film electrolyte recovery in SOFCs.
Titulo: Robust and reliable solid oxide fuel cells with modified thin film YSZ electrolyte
